Reviews.Title: Great LED TV with One Problem...
Reviews.Author: Denis A.
Reviews.Content: First off, this is in my opinion the best TV you can buy for the money right now if you want to access Netflix and other streaming services while enjoying superb picture quality. Unlike other people that have stated that SmartTV needs a LOT of improvement, I was quite impressed with the ease of use as well as functionality of this feature. If you have a slow wireless network, do not blame the TV for not being able to deliever. I have a Lynkisys N router and Comcast as my internet service provider. There are 3 computers using this router (1 hard-wired), Xbox360 (hard-wired), printer, Vonage telephone, Blu-Ray player, Kindle Fire HD, iPod, and and iPhone and now this TV. I have yet to encounter any buffering or low resolution issues using Netflix through SmartTV app. All of the shows load up promptly and the app is yet to crash.SmartTV feature therefore gets a 10/10 in my book. Granted, entering info to search for something is somewhat annoying, but the shows you watch show up on the front page, so you do not have to look for them each time you log in. Same goes for the login info, once it is entered, it is there for good (until you reset the TV). Amazon Instant Video worked well, but I did have it hang up twice; however, I had Instant Video hang up on my laptop numerous times during the playback, so it is not the TV's fault.Picture quality is a 10/10. You can tweak all sorts of settings to get the picture the way you like it. For me, only minor adjustments had to be made, one of them being turning off the MotionPlus feature. Setting it to "Clear" seemed to do the same as turning it off. The contrast ratio on this TV is outstanding - black colors are black and white colors are vivid and bright.So, you might ask why I gave this TV only 4 stars. Well, after about 2 days of use, the TV developed "clouds" or other known as backlight bleeding. I can see about 7 of these clouds whenever a dark scene is unfolding or whenever there is a pause in a TV show where there was supposed to be a commercial break. The weird thing about these "clouds" is that they are not present when TV is just powered on. It takes about 15-20 minuters for these "clouds" to develop. They also go away once the TV is turned off for about 20 minutes and turned back on, but they do come back again. My guess is that this issue somehow relates to temperature of the TV or the screen. This is not a minor backlight bleeding you might experience with non-plasma TVs and is easily visible with even well lit room. (See product pictures)I have contacted Samsung and they will be sending a tech to my home to look into this issue. If all fails, I am still in the return window with Amazon. So the review score will go up or down depending on whether or not this issue will get fixed.Other than that, a capable SmartTV with outstanding picture quality under $1,000 is a no brainer - buy it, you will love it. Just be aware of the issues that may come up. So far, Samsung has been easy to deal with. Will update as this progresses.UPDATE: Samsung had a tech call me to get a better idea of the defect. After talking to him and the tech trying really hard to pitch me the idea that the defect is nothing but a software glitch, I knew where this was going. He talked to Samsung "engineering" team and after looking at the pictures I've provided them said that the TV is within specs and that the pictures are subpar at best. They also advised me to take more pictures of live scenes with the room lit up. Now, why would they want me to do that? Simple, my camera would not be able to catch the backlight bleed and thus confirming again that the TV is running "within the specs". Amazon is great on the other hand, processed my request for the exchange promptly and the new TV should be arriving by the end of the week. Always be prepared to deal with issues like this. I would suggest registering on video or TV forums and asking around. I was disappointed with Samsung with the way they deal with these issues.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful set
Reviews.Author: Robert Devaney
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I've only owned this set for a couple of weeks, but to this point, it's been a great experience. Set up was easy, and although I didn't need them, it was nice to see they had QR code for your smart phone to read which opened videos available on line to aid in setup and operation. I had an ethernet cable connection to a router, so an internet connection was established in seconds. Updates took a few minutes, and then it was simply a matter of re-establishing Netflix, and of course, fiddling with color and sound settings to preferences. To that end, here are a settings that I have found very good on this set:- Picture mode - standard- Backlight - 10- Contrast - 88- Brightness - 45- Sharpness - 91- Color - 34- Tint - G51/R49ADVANCED:- Dynamic contrast - low- Black tone - dark- Flesh tone - +2- RGB only mode - off- Color space - auto- 10pt white balance - off- Gamma - -1- Expert pattern - off- xvYCC - offPICTURE OPTIONS:- Color tone - cool- Digital noise filter - auto- HDMI black level - normal- Film mode - auto 2- Auto motion plus - smooth- LED motion plus - off- 10pt white balance - onDid not change other specs. Set is hooked up to Time Warner Cable. Remember to set color specs for each function (Streaming movies, Blu-ray, etc.), as the default settings remain until changed in each. Very nice app suite, beautiful picture, no complaints. Just hoping it will outlast my last two HDTVs, which lasted exactly three years each.(Yes, I finally caved and bought the insurance!)

Reviews.Title: Amazon rocks!!!
Reviews.Author: Sally Davis "kk7io"
Reviews.Content: I was concerned about buying a big tv online even though  I love amazon. Two very polite young men delivered the tv, set it up, connected it to cable and took the trash away.  Totally painless. Tv is great, fine picture, intuitive remote I could not be more pleased and I did it all on computer, now that is cool!  Thanks Amazon, so much for your products and service.  One very happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Updated
Reviews.Author: Michael Sellers
Reviews.Content: UPDATED!!!!!!!  These TV's are GARBAGE! If you read my initial review i wrote it after i got one defective TV and figured a lemon is always possible, but the replacement was also defective...this time instead of the picture sometimes not coming on, the picture came on but when it first started up there were green lines all over the screen like on an old green screen apple computer when a game wouldn't load right.  Stay away from this TV...Amazon still took care of my needs as a customer but the particular model of TV seems to have serious flaws.I got my TV very quickly and was excited to set it up and see how it worked.  The very first time i tried to turn the tv on I got a black screen with a glow like the tv was on but no picture was showing up.  I turned the TV off and turned it back on and the samsung emblem popped up and then the picture came on.  I didn't think to much of it until it happened the next time i tried to turn the TV on.  I then knew there was something wrong with the tv.  I called samsung on the help line, and they told me to update my firm ware for the tv, to which i told them that this wasn't a firm ware issue it clearly was something with the hardware.  I contacted amazon and told them the problem, and that when the tv worked the picture was fantastic and it worked well, again, when the picture came on.  I was on the phone with amazon about 3-5 minutes and they shipped out a new replacement tv for me without any hassle.  This is why i gave the product a 4 star rating, because the first one I got wasn't working correctly but the customer service from amazon is why i would recommend buying this TV, as it does have a great picture and is a good price, and if you DO have problems as can happen with any electronic device, amazon will take care of the customer.

Reviews.Title: Love it but not exactly this one.
Reviews.Author: Avid Consumer2023
Reviews.Content: I bought this SmartTV from Bestbuy and got the 40" version and I absolutely love it. So i came to Amazon to get one for my living room, and of course their were larger versions for less. I got the 50" in "good condition". It came with about a 1.5" diameter crack at the top center. And little phantom cracks were starting to spread from that. So i called and Amazon set up for a return promptly and I had my money back in my account in about 10-11 days total. Aside from all that the tv itself is top notch. I believe Samsung has released newer models of their SmartTv. This is definitely a great TV. I can never buy a regular tv again.

Reviews.Title: This tv is great
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Pandullo "Pan"
Reviews.Content: TV is great.  The lighting and speed on this tv are as good as advertised.  I like the app store but honestly the novelty wore off quickly.

Reviews.Title: can't ask for more......
Reviews.Author: abdullah alfai
Reviews.Content: as amazing as it can be. it arrived fast in perfect condition. As for the product, I am a samsung tv loyal customer since lcd. maybe sony or lg are as good, but for the quality×size×features×price I think samsung will win them all....

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Wall Street Newbie
Reviews.Content: perfect size for our 1-bed apartment.  I can hook it up to my HDMI cable and use it as a big monitor for my laptop.

Reviews.Title: Best electronics purchase I've ever made
Reviews.Author: Capcyclone
Reviews.Content: I suffered a few years with a small TV because I wanted the prices of the big flat screens to come down.  They finally came down enough for me to take the plunge.......I love it!!!This Samsung is absolutely awesome - wish the internet connection was a bit faster, but overall I won't complain about that.  I am convinced Samsung is the winner in regard to best TV manufacturer right now.  Everyone else is second place.

Reviews.Title: Just buy it
Reviews.Author: Dann Rosenstein
Reviews.Content: Good value, amazing picture.  There are a lot features like the Samsung hub which has a lot of content to use.  The tv is also good for watching blu Ray movies because of the definition.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Alicia A Hoisington
Reviews.Content: We purchased this from the refurbished/damaged listings.  It was listed as having slight damage to the bezel. I don't see anything wrong with it at all and the t.v. works wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: very good TV
Reviews.Author: jack
Reviews.Content: Great purchase, fits nicely on my wall and mounted very easily. Picture is amazing and the apps and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Mauro Valenzuela
Reviews.Content: Don't buy it for the "Smart" features. They are frustratingly slow. I'm in IT and I'm used to dealing with frustrating situations but I had to give up on playing with this feature. BUT, I do enjoy the TV!I noticed after 2 months it has one dead pixel. There is a website that fixes this by connecting a computer to the TV. I haven't tried it on mine yet though.

Reviews.Title: Everything is good Just......
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: I think it is a good TV and you can  connect your wireless mouse and use tv like computer but the only problem that I have is you can not update some feature that you need for example update plugins to watch some online tv . I tried to update flash player that some online tv needs but I couldn't. but other things is good.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: wood man
Reviews.Content: A few days ago I purchased a new Samsung UN50ES6100 Smart TV.  I will be returning it in the morning.  While the quality of the picture is great, the internet capability is an illusion.  I used it twice successfully for a grand total of two hours.  Every subsequent effort to connect to the internet for any app resulted in an error code or a message indicating that it could not connect when the "Network Status" window indicated a great connection.  Samsung's claims are less than honest!  While the unit uses the word "Smart" in its description, my decision to purchase was not.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Mr. Dennis Fryer
Reviews.Content: I have the same TV in NY except it is a 55 inch model.  My TV room here is not big enough for the 55 in. so I got the 50 in.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Lisa Zartman
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv about a year and couldn't be happier. I don't use the smart hub much, but the picture is great, even in my living room which receives a lot of light. It my second samsung flat screen from Amazon and I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: MARK P.
Reviews.Content: Great picture!  Easy to use; haven't even explored many of the streaming options.Was a bit concerned about buying a TV on line, but everything went very smoothly.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture!!
Reviews.Author: shoeobsessed
Reviews.Content: You will not be disappointed at all if you purchase this television. Picture and capabilities are amazing!! I love that I can do almost anything from it! Facebook, YouTube, Netflix and even search the web!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: J_ECHO_3
Reviews.Content: I have had mine for almost a year and I have had no problems with it. Only let downs came from Time Warner and there subpar services.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Jen Leau
Reviews.Content: Had the TV for a couple of weeks and am really loving the picture quality and the slim line look.  The navigation and input using the remote versus being able to use a keyboard is a bit of a pain but it is bearable.  If I had to make a tv choice all over again I would not hesitate to choose this set again.

Reviews.Title: LED is better
Reviews.Author: K. Collins
Reviews.Content: We received this tv by special delivery which apparently is standard over 45", it wasn't really necessary but it was nice.  We don't use all the special features of the smart tv but the picture is much better than our original flat screen.  We can actually tell how good digital HD tv is now.

Reviews.Title: Could be to smart- need two remotes
Reviews.Author: ruth
Reviews.Content: can't get all the functions to work on either the AT&T; remote or the TV remote so now we are back to needing two remotes

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV's are excellent
Reviews.Author: Jim Christie
Reviews.Content: It's a Samsung so what else can you say.  Absolutely love the picture and size.  Incredibly light and easy to hook up.  Loved how when I bought a Samsung blu ray player to go with it that it automatically syncs up with the player and switches to the blu ray player input when  you put a disk in.

Reviews.Title: Great display, software lacks a bit
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for about 2 months now and all my roommates and I love it. Sometimes the software can be a bit fussy, but tends to run smoothly most of the time. The display is very realistic, and is nice for gaming. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN50ES6100 50-Inch 120Hz Slim LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: AceJas
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome HDTV.  It has just the right amount of HDMI plug-ins.  I just wished it had an over the air antennae input in addition to a cable input so I could pull my local over the air stations when cable drops out.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with our purchase.
Reviews.Author: Kevin in Flyover Country
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV over the previous holiday season and we are very pleased with it.  My only complaint is that as another reviewer noted elsewhere, several of the I/O ports are mounted facing directly backward.  This sort of defeats the purpose of a very slim tv/mount.  I have an HW E550 soundbar (configured as twin pedestal speakers) that is connected via the HDMI/ARC port (for Amazon Streaming and Netflix audio) and the cable sticks directly out the back of the TV to a depth of over 2".  I would imagine a right-angle HDMI connector would solve most of this issue.  Also, for 'non-cinematic' viewing (e.g. news, TV dramas, etc) the on-board speakers work just fine.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased.
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The picture is amazing! The design is sleek. It's a great deal. I have an Apple TV already, so I don't use the web interface. I'm very pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: Ehhh... pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Ryan P Evans
Reviews.Content: Its a great TV... AppleTV blows away the smart TV function, so don't let that influence your purchasing decision. All around it was a great TV at the price (I think it was $995).

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV review
Reviews.Author: Michelle Straumanis
Reviews.Content: Great clarity and beautifully colored picture!  We have a new "great room" and this larger sized TV and wall mount are exactly what was needed to accomodate the space

Reviews.Title: Love the way this tv looks and works! couldnt ask for more!
Reviews.Author: Cristina Chung "Cris S."
Reviews.Content: super slim tv excellent picture quality and very easy to use, love the wifi on it and the amount of USB behind the tv!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Brull
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv after looking at other reviews on amazon.com.  Overall, it's a great tv.  The picture is great, the "Smart" feature works with our wifi with no lag-time.  The sound could be better.  When watching dvds, I have to turn the volume up very loud to hear most of the dialogue.  I have tried different pre-set sound settings, but they don't seem to make any noticeable difference.  I think the only way to improve this is by getting a sound bar.While I like the tv a lot, the shipping was definitely an issue.  I chose the free shipping option through Amazon.  The order status page stated that the tv would be delivered on a certain day, but instead of reflecting the delivery date to my home, it was reflecting the drop date at the freight company.  After several calls between Amazon and the freight company, I was able to get a delivery appointment, but didn't get the notification email about setting up a delivery appointment until a day after I had all these conversations.  Amazon definitely needs look into this issue so their website is reflecting the proper delivery date.All in all, this is a great tv at an awesome price.

Reviews.Title: First Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Texter
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love our new television. I took the advice of one reviewer and decided to change the settings to our liking. What a difference that makes. It works and looks great and the old big dinosaur has moved on.

Reviews.Title: Great stuff.
Reviews.Author: randytheg
Reviews.Content: This is the best purchasing choice that I ever made in my whole life. Excellent picture quality, easy to use.Their apps store provides various choices like hulu, netflix and Facebook. I love the fact that I can watch somethingthat I used to watch on my computer, I can watch in 50inch flat screen TV now!. It requires fast broadband internetto use it smart. Otherwise, it's a TV with a lot of useless functions. Anyway, I love how it organized in the smart hub.But sometimes it's not very convenient to type something with the remote so I think I will buy smart TV keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Glorious TV
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: The TV is awesome. Has great picture clarity, its super thin, and I love the SmartTV features. We mounted it on the wall and it looks great.

Reviews.Title: Minor flaws ruin the TV for me
Reviews.Author: Charles F. Joy "x Blue Eclipse"
Reviews.Content: I own multiple Samsung TV's and this one (being the most expensive one i have bought) is the most disappointing. To save time and so that you don't have to read, i will make it simple.Pros:-Amazing Picture Quality- Screen looks great, extremely thin and sharp- Has 3 HDMI and USB ports- Has a "Game Mode" for people who play competitive 360 or PS3 games (which is extremely important to me), but graphics are slightly degraded and I'm sure the Hz go from 120 to 60 for a faster response- The sound is excellent for a thin TV. I barely ever have to pass 15 or 20 on the volume scale (it goes to 100) and I like my games loud :)- The motion flow is alright for movies (as long as the action isn't too fast or a panning shot), but if you use it in games it will make you lag as well as look really sloppyCons:- My Biggest gripe..... the TV constantly makes a ticking noise that never goes away. I'm not sure if my TV is defective or not, but theres a ticking noise coming from inside the TV every 10 seconds and its annoying as hell. It only does it when the TV is turned on, and when your sitting in your room or wherever you have your tv and you mute whatever your watching, you will instantly hear this noise. At first its no big deal (lots of TV's make strange noises when they are first turned on) but this on just keeps on ticking. After paying over 1 grand for this TV, you'd expect it to be fully functional without any weird issues- The TV menu is very disorganized. Its hard to find what you are looking for. Some of the settings are hidden away and take a while to find. Switching in and out of "Game mode" is a complete pain in the a**- The TV stand base looks dumb. I guess this is more of an opinion to be fair, but i dislike the 4 legs on the TV and would rather have a sturdy base.Overall I said a lot more good than bad, but that ticking noise just kills me. It could just be my TV is defective, but if not, Samsung customers be wary. If your's doesn't have that noise then you got yourself an excellent TV

Reviews.Title: Cannot stream ESPN3 and others requiring Adobe Flash
Reviews.Author: Dennis H
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed to have purchased this product only to find that it will not handle signals requiring Adobe Flash Player.  I would love to watch ESPN 3 for example, but this television cannot stream it.  I would not have purchase the unit had I known this limitation.  The television has a very nice picture and seems to work well in other ways.  I'm finding it very difficult to navigate using the web keyboard; very slow and cumbersome.

Reviews.Title: An OK TV
Reviews.Author: Jean-Guy Momy
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed with the colors of the TV.  I obtained a calibration DVD, but it didn't really improve the color that much.  I contacted  Samsung support and requested recommended settings.  They replied by telling me to read the manual.  I'm still trying to get the colors adjusted to my liking.  This is the first TV I've purchased that has given me so much trouble to adjust its colors. Never again Samsung.  I do have to admit that the Wi-Fi is a very nice feature and easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Love it...
Reviews.Author: Rex Smith "Tarz"
Reviews.Content: Liked it so much that I bought 3 for personal use, will be buying a few more for my surveillance system monitors...

Reviews.Title: Looks great to a non technical person
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a technical review on contrast ratio, skip this review. I don't know enough about TVs to speak confidently about the specs verses other models, however, I can say that the product looks great. The shipping process on such a high end item was a bit scary, but it worked out great. The delivery person was very professional and ensured that I was happy with the TV before leaving me to play.I played with a few of the options and took it for a test drive. To be honest, we were VERY close to returning it because the experience on it was similar to watching a soap opera. The motion and angles were making us a bit uncomfortable. After reading some of reviews, I learned that you can disable the Auto Motion feature which brought it back to the experience we were used to having while watching TV. The change was just too radical to have all at once and we may play with a few of the Auto Motion options to ease us into it.Since then, we are more than happy with the TV itself. Although loaded with features, we rarely play with any of them and only sprung for this model over the previous to get the Ultra Slim model. We use Tivo and Apple TV so have no use for the Smart software that comes with the TV.If I had to do it all over, I'd definitely go bigger. When ordering measuring 50 inches seems like a HUGE tv but I think we could have easily gotten away with a 55 or 60 inch but gave into my wife's concern that it would be too big and stuck with the 50. Quality is very sharp, colors are vibrant, I don't notice any motion blur or delay as I did with my older Samsung TV either.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV, delivery service not so much
Reviews.Author: LB
Reviews.Content: Love the TV. Smart TV that does the job. Takes some time to load contents, and yes, it's harder to type up the titles to search on Youtube, but this is not a computer. TV that does some things that computers do is great and is what we were looking for. Yes, it shows a little too real or too vivid, but we just set it at Movie mode and it took care for the most part. Very happy with the purchase and will highly recommend it to anyone looking to buy a solid smart TV.Since there's no separate section to review the delivery service, here it goes..It seems to be delivered by local delivery company. They set up a date with you and come within the timeframe. HOWEVER, only 1 person showed up instead of 2 people as promised. So what happens? This one guy drags the TV box across the driveway - I wanted to tell him to carry it instead of dragging it since it's worth a grand, but didn't have guts to. After he drags it into the house, he needs to plug it into an electrical outlet and test it out - BUT they cannot assemble the stand. So what happens? I have to help him take it out of the box and hold it up for him, so he can test it out. I felt like I did almost the half of the work but tipped him anyway. Amazon, this delivery company I would not recommend, I've seen better delivery services, so please switch them out.

Reviews.Title: I would buy another one- in a heartbeat.
Reviews.Author: Kathleeen E. Grogan
Reviews.Content: The whole family is pleases with the size of the screen- the clarity and all the options we have available to use.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN50ES6100 50-Inch 1080p 120Hz
Reviews.Author: Mikeintexas
Reviews.Content: PROS: Picture quality is great; Remote is easy to use with on/off illumination; Base stand is very sturdy; Pics,video,music,movies plays from usb flash driveCONS: No hard copy manual(e-manual in tv);Do not touch screen it will leave a smuge from finger that will only get bigger if you try to clean it without special screenclean solution(BUY SCREENCLEAN KIT WITH TV) then it is like polishing. Speakers are on bottom facing down and sound is hard to hear bouncing off table, may need sound bar or audio/video reciever to hear good.CONCLUSION: Definitely a BUY. Go ahead and buy screenclean kit with it and if you have kids get a wall mount and mount it out of reach. If your hearing is not what it use to be you may need a sound bar or an audio/video reciever hooked up to tv.

Reviews.Title: Love this slim tv
Reviews.Author: SD
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv 3 weeks ago and so far, we love it. It's the slimmest tv I've ever had. It looks very sleek. The image quality is superb. The sound is a little inconsistent from tv shows to commercials but we bought an external sound bar to deal with that. We don't even bother using the smart tv stuff. I'd recommend this tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Sudden price change
Reviews.Author: Terence Doherty
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in learning that the Samsung 50" HDTV I ordered was reduced $100 in price a day or two after my order.  Being a long time customer I would have thought the customer service person I spoke to in choosing this item would have advised me to wait a day or two.  In addition, I asked about a blu-ray and was advised to get the $79 Samsung when a newer model was available for only $10 more.  I have been very satisfied with Amazon for the several years I have shopped with you, but this time I am not completely satisfied.  I have only had the TV for a day and I have no complaints about its delivery or its functioning.  I am awaiting cables so I can connect the blu-ray player.  Your customer service person didn't advise me to get the cable when I ordered the player.  Thank you.  Note that the 50" TV is not included in your list for this message.Samsung UN55ES6100 55-Inch 1080p 120 Hz Slim LED HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: I like it a lot!!!
Reviews.Author: hiiiii
Reviews.Content: I strongly Suggest you to buy it!!I think more than 55 "will be better!AAAAA+

Reviews.Title: It's Dumb TV
Reviews.Author: Jim Gosger "Jim"
Reviews.Content: Save your money and buy a non-Smart TV.  If, as I did, you bought this to be able to use with the wireless network in your house, think again.  The TV has to be within 15 feet of your router in order to get enough signal to work over the network.  None of the apps work.  Even when it does the interface you use to input information is so clunky it takes hours to do what a computer could do in minutes.  Oh and customer service is a joke.  The phone service people are barely understandable.  They sound like they are in Bangladesh.  The web site is full of hundreds of videos, none of which address the problem that you want to solve.  Don't get me wrong the picture of this TV is great, but they are selling it as a Smart TV and charging you for those functions.  You are better off buying a dumb TV and waiting for the industry to solve these problems.  I wish I knew this before I bought mine.

Reviews.Title: This TV is Awesome
Reviews.Author: robin martin
Reviews.Content: TV Works great.  The color is great.  The picture is so clear it looks sorta 3D.  Easy to install and use too!  If definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Mary Lou
Reviews.Content: We love everything about this TV including the delivery! My husband was speechless with this Christmas gift the picture quality make it hard to watch tv anywhere else. Samsung is the way to go and Amazon makes this the perfect gift without any hassle

Reviews.Title: Eye popper
Reviews.Author: Samar
Reviews.Content: Mounted it in my bedroom. Huge TV, great picture and sound. Definitely an eye popper when friends and guests come over! ...Now to only stop watching Netflix and get out of my bedroom!

Reviews.Title: awsome picture quality
Reviews.Author: tvsd
Reviews.Content: This tv went upto my expectation. Picture quality is awesome....Sound is not that much powerful but i plan to have extra speakers installed or a home theature system.I am very much happy with this purchase.I have a Sony DVD player ( SR510h ) and it works very well with this tv...Great picture quality.Pros:Picture quality.Internet works well.Cons:Sound Watching cable is ok. You need to increase the sound to 75+ to get a good feel of movie.Internet ->  sound on intenet is ok. you need to move sound to 80 to get a good feel of sound.

Reviews.Title: Not a review but a question for those who have DirecTV and a Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: I wanted to make its own subject so I could see the response.  The 2012 Smart TV's are supposed to have the capability to have DirecTV hooked up to it without having to have a "box".  Samsung announced this earlier in the year (I think at the CES) and I have also heard this from DirecTV.  Is there anyone out there running this set up currently and if so, how well is it done?  Thanks in advance for the responses.

ProductInfo.Features:
Smart Content with Signature Services
Built-in Wi-Fi
Smart Hub
